com.codisimus.plugins.turnstile

Class Turnstile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codisimus.plugins.turnstile.Turnstile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.configuration.serialization.ConfigurationSerializable

    public class Turnstile
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.bukkit.configuration.serialization.ConfigurationSerializable
    A Turnstile is a fence or door used as a gate.

         java.lang.String owner,
         org.bukkit.block.Block block)
        Constructs a new Turnstile
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Turnstile which cannot already exist
        owner - The Player who is creating the Turnstile and also the default owner
        block - The Block of the Trendula

        public boolean checkOneWay(org.bukkit.block.Block from)
        Checks if the Player is attempting to enter the Turnstile backwards
        Parameters:
        from - The Block the Player is entering the Turnstile from
        Returns:
        false if Player is attempting to enter Turnstile from the wrong direction

        public boolean checkBalance(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if the Player could afford to open the Turnstile
